refnamediv.refpurpose: Daemon which allow logging of interesting values to text file.

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: This daemon connect to RTS2, and then dumps in predefined interval values of intereset for each device. It is similar to rts2-logger1, except that it runs forewer and can be started as standard daemon, e.g. from rts2 configuration.

refsect1.title: OPTIONS
refsect1.para: These programs follow the usual &gnu; command line syntax, with long options starting with two dashes (`-'). A summary of options is included below.

listitem.para: Change central server location. Defaults to localhost.
Change central server port number. Default value is specified with compilation, default is 617.
Specify to take configuration input from file instead of from standart input, which is default. For description of file format please see CONFIGURATION FILE FORMAT section in rts2-logger1.
Specify output filename, or output filename expansion string. For expansion string please see rts2-ini5. Most probably you will put there %y%m%d-%H%M%S.%s.log.

refsect1.title: OUTPUT
refsect1.para: Output is written to standard output or to file specified with expansion string using either -o option, or changing of output variable. For output format, please see rts2-logger1 manual page.
For details about expansion strings in output filename, please see rts2.ini5. The string which you would most probably like to see is %y%m%d-%H%M%S.%s.log.
